sentence.text: Physiological changes resulting from smoking cessation, with or without nicotine replacement, may alter the pharmacokinetics of certain concomitant medications, such as tricyclic antidepressants and theophylline.
sentence.negationtags: Physiological changes resulting from smoking cessation, with or <scope> <cue> without </cue> nicotine replacement, may alter the pharmacokinetics of certain concomitant medications, such as tricyclic antidepressants and theophylline. </scope>

sentence.text: Doses of these and perhaps other medications may need to be adjusted in patients who successfully quit smoking.
